tool_description: Measures and analyzes system throughput including requests per second, data transfer rates, and transaction processing capacity.

measurement_endpoints.description: List of endpoints or services to measure throughput

measurement_duration_minutes.description: Duration of throughput measurement in minutes (1-240)

error_messages: Invalid endpoints: Provide valid URLs or service identifiers
Invalid measurement duration: Must be between 1 and 240 minutes
Endpoint unreachable: One or more endpoints are not accessible for measurement
usage: Provide measurement_endpoints array with URLs or service identifiers to measure. Set measurement_duration_minutes to define how long to collect throughput data.

measurement_id.description: Unique identifier for this throughput measurement

avg_requests_per_second.description: Average requests per second across all endpoints

data_transfer_rate_mbps.description: Average data transfer rate in megabits per second
